replies.body: Agreed, there was a post on reddit with a better version of it so hopefully Riot uses that one instead of the one they made, doesn't look like Katarina at all, shes so ugly and out of shape, how you turn a very beautiful assassin into this ugly out of shape one i have no idea, she also looks like she has aged a lot, like 10 years at least, terrible decision to be honest.

I don't care if they make her look older, although then it makes no sense lorewise to up the age-look too much. However, I think she shouldn't look 16 like her classic splash currently looks. But yeah, it looks pretty much nothing like Katarina. Its a dramatic change and it makes her joints look as fluid as Zac's. Are we sure this isn't a new Zac skin? :P
Also, why has no pointed out that her hair is super pink in that splash?

Every time when i see this new katarina wallpaper i want to be blinded.
How the fck to kidding too much with her really :| ?
It's so played and easy to be killed , but every time it's so fun.
HIS FACE = LIKE VI'S FACE + A HOT  CARROT :| xD
